title: General
fullText:
The following requirements apply to the installation of luminaires, appliances, and other items of electrical equipment, excluding those specified in Clauses 6.3.4.3 (socket-outlets) and 6.3.4.4 (switches and other accessories), in classified zones.
Luminaires, appliances, and other electrical equipment installed in Zone 0 shall be: (a) designed and constructed specifically for use in a swimming or spa pool; and (b) provided with the required degree of protection; and (c) appliances and other electrical equipment shall comply with the requirements of Clause 1.7.3.
